reviews.title: Superb software but where\'s the translation?
reviews.comment: This is exactly what i need but everything is in german, and it fills everything with german tasks :-( hip our there\'s an option to co user languages in the future
reviews.author: Ianne Miave

reviews.title: awesome but sync issue
reviews.comment: tried the web interface, made a change, loaded the app, and the change wasn\'t there even after clicking sync. i hope when i get a tablet there isn\'t sync issues across multiple android devices.
reviews.author: James Kohl
